tool_description: キーワード、郵便番号を指定して住所情報（緯度経度、郵便番号など）を取得することができます。　Return address informations including longitude/latitude and a postal code, by specifying keywords or a postal code.
name: NAVITIME Geocoding
title: NAVITIME Geocoding

api_list.name: datum_conversion
api_list.description: 緯度経度の測地系(日本測地系/世界測地系)を変換します。

required_parameters.name: coord
required_parameters.description:
Latitude and longitude before conversion.
Support millisecond and degree indication.

required_parameters.name: after_datum
required_parameters.description:
Geodetic system after conversion.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

api_list.name: address_inclusion
api_list.description: 緯度経度が住所コードの範囲内に含まれているかを判定します。

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description:
Address Code.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

api_list.name: address_reverse_geocoding
api_list.description:
逆ジオコーディング
緯度経度を指定して住所情報を取得します。

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

api_list.name: address
api_list.description: Return address information such as a postal code or latitude/longitude from free keyword of request parameters.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: kana_row
optional_parameters.description:
Output result filter (consonants).
Only addresses in the response that begin with the letter on the specified line will be returned.

Available only when 'code' is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

optional_parameters.name: level_from
optional_parameters.description:
Minimum address level.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 7)
Narrow down to only addresses up to a specified address level
　1: Prefecture
　2: City, ward, town or village
　3: Large sections
　4: Small sections
　5: Block
　6: Land number
　7: Branch number

optional_parameters.name: level_to
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum address level.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 7)
Narrow down to only addresses up to a specified address level
　1: Prefecture
　2: City, ward, town or village
　3: Large sections
　4: Small sections
　5: Block
　6: Land number
　7: Branch number

optional_parameters.name: word
optional_parameters.description:
Search word.

You cannot be used in combination with 'code'.
Please be sure to specify either 'word' or 'code'.

optional_parameters.name: code
optional_parameters.description:
Address code.

You cannot be used in combination with 'word'.
Please be sure to specify either 'word' or 'code'.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Sorting order of addresses.
(lexical: lexical order, level_asc: address level ascending order, code_asc: address code ascending order (default))

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Skips a given number of first data.
(Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 2000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: address_filter
optional_parameters.description:
Address filter.

You can use this when you want to get a specific address code.
If you prefix the address code with a '-', you can exclude the relevant address from the response.

Available only when 'word' is specified.

api_list.name: address_code
api_list.description: Return address information from address code of request parameters.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description:
Address Code.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

api_list.name: address_postal_code
api_list.description: Return address information from postal code of request parameters.

required_parameters.name: postal_code
required_parameters.description: Postal code string (Minimum: 3 digits, Maximum: 7 digits)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Skips a given number of first data.
(Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 2000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

api_list.name: address_autocomplete
api_list.description: Return address predictions from the specified keyword of request parameters.

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description:
Address string (Minimum: 2 characters, Maximum: 50 characters).

If a string of 51 or more characters is entered, the 51st and subsequent characters will be deleted and searched.
Arabic and Chinese numerals are searched as they are.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)
